availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry W. Conway (Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Nicholas County, Kentucky, native. Married to Esther E. Bell Conway in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on November 8, 1864. Father of Bruce Conway. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Merchant in Nicholas County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 28.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Precinct 2, p. 211A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Nicholas County, KY, July 1863, p. 5.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film 000252393, p. 386-7.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Nicholas County Administrators Bonds, May-1871, p. 119.
"Henry W. Conway (1831-1871)," Find A Grave, Memorial #22985975, accessed July 19, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22985975.
